mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO door_staff_record_count (name, realname, floor_num, device_id, device_name, project_name, build_name, project_type, out_id, user_id, project_id, opendoor_type, ic_id, content, face_picture, role_id, gate_type, visit_time, is_deal, deal_num, deal_result, is_ignore, is_del, user_name, start_date, end_date, floor_name, room_name, build_id, floor_id, room_id, mobile, body_temperature, is_normal, is_fail, branch_id, gender, nation, id_card, mj_card_from, rfid_card, similarity, reg_pic_info, snap_pic_info, remote_open_door, birthday, customize_id, database_id) VALUES
(#{item.name}, #{item.realname}, #{item.floorNum}, #{item.deviceId}, #{item.deviceName}, #{item.projectName}, #{item.buildName}, #{item.projectType}, #{item.outId}, #{item.userId}, #{item.projectId}, #{item.opendoorType}, #{item.icId}, #{item.content}, #{item.facePicture}, #{item.roleId}, #{item.gateType}, #{item.visitTime}, #{item.isDeal}, #{item.dealNum}, #{item.dealResult}, #{item.isIgnore}, #{item.isDel}, #{item.userName}, #{item.startDate}, #{item.endDate}, #{item.floorName}, #{item.roomName}, #{item.buildId}, #{item.floorId}, #{item.roomId}, #{item.mobile}, #{item.bodyTemperature}, #{item.isNormal}, #{item.isFail}, #{item.branchId}, #{item.gender}, #{item.nation}, #{item.idCard}, #{item.mjCardFrom}, #{item.rfidCard}, #{item.similarity}, #{item.regPicInfo}, #{item.snapPicInfo}, #{item.remoteOpenDoor}, #{item.birthday}, #{item.customizeId}, #{item.databaseId})
